subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: DeGrom, the Mets’ lone All-Star, pitched eight scoreless innings and struck out 10 even as the Mets grew more concerned about the health of the slumping veteran Michael Cuddyer.
snippet: DeGrom, the Mets’ lone All-Star, pitched eight scoreless innings and struck out 10 even as the Mets grew more concerned about the health of the slumping veteran Michael Cuddyer.
